pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easily Apply Formats to Data // Contains a set of functions that can be used to apply formats to data frames or vectors. The package aims to provide to functionality similar to that of SAS formats. Formats are assigned to the format attribute on data frame columns. Then when the fdata() function is called, a new data frame is created with the column data formatted as specified. The package also contains a value() function to create a user-defined format, similar to a SAS user-defined format.
